name: evm-cross-deployer
description: Deploy your smart contracts across multiple EVM chains with the same deterministic address.
author: Pascal Marco Caversaccio

scripts.test: npm run clean && npx hardhat test
scripts.coverage: npm run clean && npx hardhat coverage
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run clean && npx hardhat run --network rinkeby ts-node scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.verify:rinkeby: npm run clean && npx hardhat verify --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run clean && npx hardhat run --network ropsten ts-node scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.verify:ropsten: npm run clean && npx hardhat verify --network ropsten
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run clean && npx hardhat run --network kovan ts-node scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.verify:kovan: npm run clean && npx hardhat verify --network kovan
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run clean && npx hardhat run --network goerli ts-node scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.verify:goerli: npm run clean && npx hardhat verify --network goerli
scripts.deploy:main: npm run clean && npx hardhat run --network main ts-node scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.verify:main: npm run clean && npx hardhat verify --network main
